/**********************************
***   Yeasin Arafat(ACWizard)  ****
*** University of Asia Pacific ****
***       Dept. of CSE         ****
**********************************/

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define sc(n) scanf("%d", &n)
#define M 10000007
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;

string str;
vector <int> Day, Ans;

int main(){
    LL k, n, tmp;
    int t, c;
    sc(t);
    while(t--){
        cin >> str;
        cin >> k;
        while(k){
            LL md = k%2LL;
            k >>= 1LL;
            Day.push_back((int)md);
        }
        reverse(Day.begin(), Day.end());
        int sz1 = Day.size(), sz2 = str.size();
        c = 0;
        sz1 --, sz2--;
        while(sz1 >= 0 && sz2 >= 0){
            int p = Day[sz1]+(str[sz2]-'0')+c;
            if(p == 2)Ans.push_back(0), c = 1;
            else if(p == 3)Ans.push_back(1), c = 1;
            else Ans.push_back(p), c = 0;
            sz1--, sz2--;
        }
        if(sz1 >= 0){
            for(int i = sz1; i >= 0; i--){
                int p = Day[i]+c;
                if(p == 2)Ans.push_back(0), c = 1;
                else Ans.push_back(p), c = 0;
            }
        }
        if(sz2 >= 0){
            for(int i = sz2; i >= 0; i--){
                int p = (str[i]-'0')+c;
                if(p == 2)Ans.push_back(0), c = 1;
                else Ans.push_back(p), c = 0;
            }
        }
        if(c)Ans.push_back(c);
        int sz = Ans.size();
        for(int i = sz-1; i >= 0; i--)cout << Ans[i];
        puts("");
        Ans.clear(); Day.clear(); str.clear();
    }
    return 0;
}
